topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

topics.body: Well there were these two boys I used to baby-sit. They were brothers. Eight and ten years old. And their homelives were _tough_ to say the least. It was so bad that that they went to therapy for it. And apparently one day during their therapy session the doc asked them if they had any respectable male role-models in their life. And apparently before anyone else, they both said me. I was their role model.  I was someone they could look up to. I teared up a bit when their mom told me...
